document.title: OpenConvert text conversion tools
document.intro: The present OpenConvert tools output TEI from a number of input formats. Furthermore, as a proof of concept, the website currently provides two annotation tools: a simple Tokenize for TEI files and a modern Dutch part of speech tagger
